author: jbellis
msg: add -XX:SurvivorRatio=128 -XX:MaxTenuringThreshold=0 to default gc options.  patch by Brandon Williams; reviewed by jbellis for CASSANDRA-504

author: dkulp
msg: MS changed addresses in wsdl/schemas, update to account for that.

author: stephenc
msg: [MINVOKER-96] Adding a selector based on current maven version
- I have opted to keep the version selection syntax the same as for JRE and OS versions

- Detection of the maven version is via the classloader for MavenProject.  This assumes that MavenProject is always in org.apache.maven:maven-core. This is the case for 2.x and 3.x, but if this changes the plugin will need to be fixed.
